name: Midnight Maze
description:
I said I'd make a game one night, but then pissed away the entire evening playing PubG instead. What you're about to experience is a game made in the short, moonlit space between finishing playing PubG and finally going to bed*. 

Also, even though it was midnight, I inexplicably took the time to make it compatible with game controllers. It made sense at the time.

Enjoy.

*It takes Rockstar like what, 3 years to make a game? So actually I think smashing one out right before bed is pretty impressive. If you're reading this and you work at Rockstar, call me.
